member.name: P:BerwickHeights.Platform.Core.Model.AuditInfoBase.DoNotSetModified
member.summary: Used by NHibernate interceptor. If set to true, then the interceptor will not set the Modified and ModifedBy columns to the current time and current user before saving. Instead, the Modified and ModifiedBy columns will be saved as these values exist in the object. This is useful for cloning GBO elements since these values should remain consistent between the original and the clone. NB: This value is not persisted in the database.

member.name: T:BerwickHeights.Platform.Core.Config.ConfigurationSvcBase
member.summary: Abstract base class to be used by implementations of IConfiguration.

member.name: T:BerwickHeights.Platform.Core.Config.IConfigurationSvc
member.summary: Interface to a service that provides application configuration.

member.name: T:BerwickHeights.Platform.Core.IoC.IIoCComponent
member.summary: Empty interface that is used to find components to install in registration-by-convention logic. All components that are to be automatically registered using configuration-by-convention should have their interfaces inherit this interface so that they'll be registered in the IoC container.

member.name: M:BerwickHeights.Platform.Core.Config.IConfigurationSvc.GetBooleanConfig(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns a boolean configuration value based on the given key or the given default value if the configuration key does not match.

member.name: M:BerwickHeights.Platform.Core.Config.IConfigurationSvc.GetStringConfig(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a string configuration value based on the given key. Throws a ConfigurationErrorsException if the given key does not match any configuration values and the provided defaultVal is null.

member.name: M:BerwickHeights.Platform.Core.Config.IConfigurationSvc.GetStringConfig(System.String,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a string configuration value based on the given key. Throws a ConfigurationErrorsException if isMandatory is true, the provided defaultVal is null and the given key does not match any configuration values.

member.name: M:BerwickHeights.Platform.Core.Config.IConfigurationSvc.GetStringArrayConfig(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a string array of configuration values by splitting the string value based on the given key into a string array using a comma as a separator. Throws a ConfigurationErrorsException if the given key does not match any configuration values.

member.summary: Returns a string array of configuration values by splitting the string value based on the given key into a string array using a comma as a separator. Throws a ConfigurationErrorsException if isMandatory is true and the given key does not match any configuration values.

member.name: M:BerwickHeights.Platform.Core.Config.IConfigurationSvc.GetIntConfig(System.String)
member.summary: Returns an integer configuration value based on the given key. Throws a ConfigurationErrorsException if isMandatory is true and the given key does not match any configuration values.

member.summary: Returns an integer configuration value based on the given key. Throws a ConfigurationErrorsException if isMandatory is true and the given key does not match any configuration values.

member.name: T:BerwickHeights.Platform.Core.CurrentUser.ICurrentUserSvc
member.summary: Provides information about the user who is currently using this thread. The information is kept in the thread's local storage so that it can be retrieved at any point in the architectural stack.

member.name: M:BerwickHeights.Platform.Core.CurrentUser.ICurrentUserSvc.GetCurrentUserData
member.summary: Retrieves information about the user who currently using this thread. If the returned object has the IsInitialized property set to false, then you must not use the retrieved information.

member.name: M:BerwickHeights.Platform.Core.CurrentUser.ICurrentUserSvc.SetCurrentUserData(BerwickHeights.Platform.Core.CurrentUser.CurrentUserData)
member.summary: Sets the user data in the thread's local storage according to the given current user data.
member.param: The user data to be set in thread's local storage.

member.name: M:BerwickHeights.Platform.Core.CurrentUser.ICurrentUserSvc.ResetCurrentUserData
member.summary: Un-sets the user data in the thread's local storage so that it is no longer intialized. This is important in multi-threaded situation so that the thread's local storage is cleared out before another user begins using the thread.

member.summary: Registers components that are called in-process by looking for any types in the given assemblies that implement an interface that inherits from IIocComponent.

member.summary: Registers components that are proxied to a remote component by looking for any types in the given assemblies that implement an interface that inherits from IIocComponent.

The list of assemblies to check for types that implement an interface that inherits from IIocComponent.

member.summary: Registers components that service remote requests by looking for any types in the given assemblies that implement an interface that inherits from IIocComponent.
member.param: The URL of the service that is hosting the component.
The list of assemblies to check for types that implement an interface that inherits from IIocComponent.

member.summary: Registers the given implementation type as a singleton component in the IoC container with the given service (interface) type.
member.param: The type (interface) of the component service.
The implementation type for the component.

member.summary: Registers the given instance as a component in the IoC container. The service type and component id are set as given.
member.param: The type (interface) of the component service.
The instance to register as a component.
The id of the component.

member.name: M:BerwickHeights.Platform.Core.IoC.IIoCContainerManager.SetupASPNetMVCIntegration
member.summary: Sets up integration between the IoC container and ASP.Net MVC so that controllers are generated by the IoC container instead of ASP.NEt MVC framework.

member.summary: Returns a component that implements the given interface.

member.summary: Returns a component that implements the given interface and has the given component id.

member.name: P:BerwickHeights.Platform.Core.CurrentUser.CurrentUserData.OperationId
member.summary: The operation ID is used to group all operations that occur in a single transaction.

member.name: P:BerwickHeights.Platform.Core.CurrentUser.CurrentUserData.IsInitialized
member.summary: Whether or not the user information has been initialized for this thread. If the value of this property is false, then the data in this object must not be used.

member.name: T:BerwickHeights.Platform.Core.IoC.InterceptorDescriptor
member.summary: Describes an instance of an interceptor registered in the IoC container. Interceptors are typically used for Aspect Oriented Programming (AOP).

member.name: M:BerwickHeights.Platform.Core.IoC.InterceptorDescriptor.#ctor(System.Type,System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Constructor.
member.param: The type of this interceptor.
Interceptor-specific configuration for this instance as key-value pairs.
If the full type name of a component starts with one of these namespace prefixes, then this interceptor will intercept the component.
The list of full type names for components that will not be intercepted by this interceptor. Used to prevent endless recursion in the IoC container of internal types that should not be intercepted.

member.name: P:BerwickHeights.Platform.Core.IoC.InterceptorDescriptor.InterceptorType
member.summary: The type of this interceptor.

member.name: P:BerwickHeights.Platform.Core.IoC.InterceptorDescriptor.Config
member.summary: Interceptor-specific configuration for this instance as key-value pairs.

member.name: P:BerwickHeights.Platform.Core.IoC.InterceptorDescriptor.NamespacePrefixes
member.summary: If the full type name of a component starts with one of these namespace prefixes, then this interceptor will intercept the component.

member.name: P:BerwickHeights.Platform.Core.IoC.InterceptorDescriptor.IgnoredTypes
member.summary: The list of full type names for components that will not be intercepted by this interceptor. Used to prevent endless recursion in the IoC container of internal types that should not be intercepted.
